areas.name: Classroom
areas.script:
music none
char colias
open_talk "Who's that?"

talks.Who's that?:
set asked_colias 1
char colias
pr Who's that?
pose colias serious
cp That's the guy I told you about... Coach something....
pr Oh... What do I do?
pose colias normal
cp Go up to him and see what he wants. Just make a good impression bro
